=== About Me ===
I am Robert Keidel. I was born in Germany and moved to Los Angeles/CA in the year of 2003. I'm a System Administrator with a passion for Linux, in particular for Ubuntu. Back in Germany my main distribution was SuSE. I am fulltime employee and attending an on-line University to get my Bachelor degree in Network Administration.

=== Interests ===
My interests are in desktop and systems administration.
